```{r setup, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(out.width = "300px", fig.align = "center", dpi = 300)
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_bw())
library(itsadug)
library(tidymv)
```

```{r gam}
set.seed(10)
data <- gamSim(4)
model <- gam(
    y ~
        fac +
        s(x2, by = fac) +
        s(x0),
    data = data
)
```

```{r plot-1-2}
plot_gamsd(
    model = model,
    view = "x2",
    comparison = list(fac = c("1", "2"))
)
```

```{r plot-1-3}
plot_gamsd(
    model = model,
    view = "x2",
    comparison = list(fac = c("1", "3"))
)
```
